description:
Introduction

   • Wrong: trying to fit each NoSQL database in a pigeonhole
   • Right: understanding the design decisions and tradeoffs made
   • Products discussed: Cassandra, CouchDB, HBase, MongoDB, Neo4J, Redis, Riak, Scalaris, Tokyo Cabinet, Voldemort

Scalability

   • Scaling reads vs scaling writes
   • Adding (and removing) machines to a live cluster
   • Multiple data centers

Operations

   • Failure scenarios
   • Monitoring
   • Schema changes

Data and query model

   • Key/Value
   • ColumnFamily
   • Document
   • Graph
   • More

Persistence design

   • Affects both speed and features
   • B-trees
   • Memtable/SSTable
   • Pluggability
title: The NoSQL Ecosystem
